attributes.action: Repeat the referendum on EU membership
attributes.additional_details:
The original referendum must be re-run, with the same questions, so that the people can vote with full knowledge of the options that are actually available.

The questions will be ‘Should the UK remain in the European Union?’

Yes – Article 50 will be withdrawn and the UK will continue to be a full member.

No – The UK will immediately leave the EU without any specific deal.
attributes.background:
It has become clear that Parliament will never reach a consensus on Brexit, even with further time extensions.

The withdrawal deal that has been negotiated with the EU is unacceptable to almost everyone.
